Info.Description:
This tool allows you to interchange the color channels (Red, Green, Blue, and Alpha) in your image. It's a powerful way to experiment with color and create unique, artistic effects.
Options include: Red, InvertedRed, Green, InvertedGreen, Blue, InvertedBlue, Alpha, InvertedAlpha, One (full intensity), or Zero (no intensity).

Properties.Name: Red Channel
Properties.Summary: This allows you to substitute the red channel with another color or alpha channel.

Properties.Name: Green Channel
Properties.Summary: This lets you replace the green channel with another color or alpha channel.

Properties.Name: Blue Channel
Properties.Summary: This property swaps the blue channel with another color or alpha channel.

Properties.Name: Alpha Channel
Properties.Summary: This swaps the alpha (transparency) channel with another color or alpha channel.

Info.Label: Enum values:
Info.Text: Red, Inverted Red, Green, Inverted Green, Blue, Inverted Blue, Alpha, Inverted Alpha, One and Zero
